Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean, basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: erika l
Reviews.Content: Good area in the West side of Berlin (not the trendiest) but close to Zoo station, therefore easy to get to most places. Solo traveller, felt nice and safe to leave my things. Helpful staff and wifi in room. I hada single bed and small tv and desk. perfect if you want just a nice place to be based while exploring the city- there are also some good pizza places around which are cheap and excellent, 4 euros for a large pizza! There are also lots of bakeries that sell coffee for the morning- this is important to me! If you want to go out late there are lots of night buses that run to Zoo which isn't far.

Reviews.Title: “Good if you are on a budget”
Reviews.Author: yiotadelta
Reviews.Content: The hotel looks modern and actually has a nice reception area. However, a double room is very small even for one person and amenities are very "spartan". Breakfast buffet is adequate. It is in general a good value for money if you don't intend to spend too much time in your hotel room. It is 10 minutes walk to Ku' Damm and there is also a very nice bar restaurant just around the corner (Weyers, with an area for smokers) and a taxi rank.

Reviews.Title: “decent hotel close to kudamm”
Reviews.Author: mamalo66
Reviews.Content: I was there in March 2012, together with wife, receptionist young lady was very kind and provided us room immediately upon arrival, though it was 11:45 in the morning. room was ok by size, but bad was so tiny that even for 1 person would be small, free wi-fi was working normal, the only inconvenience is that you need to take new sign-in every 24 hours, breakfast was OK, location as well, kudamm is around 7-8 minutes to walk.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, clean, simple.”
Reviews.Author: MrOYC
Reviews.Content: Hotel with a good location, a 5-minute walk from Ku'damm (Berlin's "main avenue" in a way). Two or three bus stops away from the ZooGarden, 4 minute walk to the first subway/bus station. Anyway, you got it, it's well located. I like rooms to be big, so I went for the junior suite, which was spacious (~30m²), clean and comfortable. Bathroom was well-design although a mild piping smell kept coming and going for the first two nights. It was manageable but rather unpleasant. The art in the room was to my liking. As a matter of fact, I requested the room with the artwork I had seen on their website. And got that very room. Breakfast was kinda poor after 9, but that doesn't really matter, you're in Berlin, don't eat breakfast at the hotel... please. Personnel service was uneven. Some receptionists were incredibly nice, others were practically rude. Got a good deal on the room, all in all it was a good stay. Berlin is known for its cheap private appartments rentals, but in case you want hotel services, don't hesitate much about this one. The little russian restaurant nearby serves surprisingly delicious food, but don't expect them to understand you if you don't speak german. Check-in and out were hassle-free.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, very clean and modern”
Reviews.Author: goodi134
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 6 nights in August in one of the suites on the 4th floor. Very comfortable room, clean. The room was at the back of the hotel so was not noisy. Very modern bathroom. Only problem there was no plug for the handbasin so water tap had to be left running while my husband was shaving. Modern design of handbasin - not very practical when one cannot fill the basin with water! Helpful reception staff. Great to have free wi-fi AND be able to print as well.

Reviews.Title: “Well Location, No Frills”
Reviews.Author: Janne_HEL
Reviews.Content: Nice and reasonably priced hotel. Located just couple of blocks away from the ku'damm street, in the nice part of the city. I stayed in a single room which was smallish but clean and well maintained. No frills or luxury, but this place gives all the basic amenities for a good price. Might stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with wifi”
Reviews.Author: moonraker801
Reviews.Content: This really is a good modern and comfortable hotel, i cannot comment on the breakfast but i enjoyed my stay at this hotel which is a five minute walk fom the ulandstrasse ubahn station. The hotel offers a good fast wifi connection for free which for the modern traveler is a real advantage. i plan to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great price, ok location”
Reviews.Author: NiclasSweden
Reviews.Content: Book early and got an early booking-fee, the cost were only €90 for two persons and two nights. We arrived at Tegel airport and took the local bus to Zoologischer Garten, a trip of about 20 minutes. However, we got off a stop earlier than the planned and ended up on the same street as the Hotel, so a 5-10 minute walk later we were at the Hotel! The location is on a side street of Ku’damm, and it is about a 15 minutes to walk to Gedächtniskirche, so please be aware that you are not staying at Ku’damm, but in the vicinity. The area around the hotel is otherwise very calm with little traffic and great restaurants and coffee shops. You also have a U-bahn close to the Hotel. The rooms were clean and the Hotel as such was OK, nothing fancy but then nothing to complain about either, would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very central”
Reviews.Author: ingem_johansen
Reviews.Content: Had the pleasure staying there for 5 days. A few minutes walk to Ku´dam. The rooms vere nice, the breakfast could have been better, but OK.

Reviews.Title: “I've have been robbed here”
Reviews.Author: donna_anka
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in this hotel just to take a sleep. We've checked in and they have charged my credit card without asking me. So, we have put our photobags in the room and gone to have a short walk in Berlin. Note, you have to leave the room key on the reception. We did so. After we came back the man on the reception told us that he can't find our key and gave us a master key. We came in our room: it was opened and the key was on the table. our stuff and cams were stolen. We came to the reception (haven't closed the room) and asked to call the police. He dialed one strange phone number and only after that called the police. After it we have found our stuff in the room, but not the cigarettes and some other stuff (like UF filter for my cam..) The manager recommended us to change the room (same category) and cancel police call. At the check-out we have been charged for the room price again. So, I will never stay in Domus Garni, there' s a lot of hotels around, maybe they cost more, but would you risk your safety for 10 euros?

Reviews.Title: “might be a better hotel in Berlin but why bother looking ?”
Reviews.Author: TRUBADUR
Reviews.Content: Stayed in the Domus 3 times over 4 years , and each time was identical to the other , no changes at all !!! which is good when everything is excellent. the staff are the greatest , in their own German manner they always did everything they could to help assist and solve any question i might had , no matter how foolish. the place is clean like a laboratory and located 5 minuets from the Kudam st. what else you might expect from a 3 star hotel ? a little better breakfast maybe. Domus means home , which is just that. see you next year

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Domus grew on us”
Reviews.Author: letmbkids
Reviews.Content: Our initial impression was disappointing but over the two days we stayed here it grew on us. The only other people we saw staying here were old men which was kinda weird but once we got accustomed to our surroundings, it was okay. I'm not sure I would stay here again. We seriously overpaid because we were there for World Cup. Our next visit to Berlin, we'll stay near Potsdamer Platz. Rooms were fair, carpet of Days Inn quality, bathrooms tiny. You could smell smoke from adjoining rooms during the night. We never even tried the breakfast but opted for the fresh fruit market next door. The front desk staff was friendly and accomodating. One highlight was the Hamlet restaurant nearby. Great atmosphere, friendly service and good food.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed many times at the Domus”
Reviews.Author: emweiner
Reviews.Content: Have stayed many times at this small hotel set in a charming upscale area of Munich near the town center, museums by foot or underground. Can't say enough about the hospitality, breakfast, cleanliness and location. Great little restaurants in the area too!

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Domus garni
HotelInfo.Address: Uhlandstr. 49, 10719 Berlin, Germany
